name: Huirong Fu
content: Huirong Fu Huirong Fu Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering School of Engineering and Computer Science Oakland University Rochester, MI 48309-4478 Office: EC 528 Phone: (248) 370-4456 Fax: (248) 370-4625 Email: fu at oakland.edu Teaching Research Service Grants Awards and Honors NSF REU Site NSA/NSF GenCyber Camp Google Scholar Link Education · 2000              Nanyang Technological University, Singapore                                           Ph.D. in EEE · 1997              Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications, P. R. China            M.Eng. in EE · 1994              Shanghai Jiao Tong University, P. R. China B.Eng. in EE Appointments · 2015-                                  Full Professor                    CSE, Oakland University, Michigan · 2009-2015 Associate Professor           CSE, Oakland University, Michigan · 2005-2009 Assistant Professor CSE, Oakland University, Michigan · 2002-2005                          Assistant Professor            CS, North Dakota State University, North Dakota · 2000-2002 Post-Doctoral Fellow ECE/CS, Rice University, Texas Research Interests · Security, Privacy and Trust Management · Wireless and Mobile Networks · Sensor Networks · Networks / Protocols / Applications · Internet Data Center · Multimedia Communication Systems · Resource Management and Quality of Service (QoS) · Audio & Video Processing and Transmission April 27th, 2016.
